text: Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson are forced back in bed – in front of the cameras, of course. Critics claim that Jamie and Dakota ’ s sex scenes for ‘ Fifty Shades Darker ’ are so bad that they are being forced to reshoot everything. Jamie plays BDSM - lover Christian Grey in the big screen adaption of the ‘ Fifty Shades ’ series. Christian Grey has a rather sadomasochistic relationship with college graduate Anastasia Steele, who is played by Dakota Johnson. ‘ Fifty Shades of Grey ’ had mixed reviews back in 2015, but it looks like ’ Fifty Shades Darker ’ might even be worse.
